original_text: And Micaiah said, “Behold, you shall see on that day when you go into an inner chamber to hide yourself.”
korean_text: 미가야가 이르되 네가 골방에 들어가서 숨는 그 날에 보리라

sentences.original_text: you shall see on that day
when you go into an inner chamber to hide yourself.
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 자신을 숨기려고 내실에 들어갈 때에
